name: Board's employees
text: §467-5  Board's employees.  Subject to chapter 76, the department of commerce and consumer affairs may employ and remove such administrative and clerical assistants as the real estate commission requires and prescribe their powers and duties. [L 1933, c 140, pt of §4; RL 1935, pt of §7313; RL 1945, pt of §7734; am L 1951, c 77, pt of §2; RL 1955, pt of §170-4; am imp L 1963, c 21, §1 and c 114, §3; HRS §467-5; am L 1982, c 204, §8; am L 2000, c 253, §150]
